title: Mini-Ep 36: Gym Time and Surviving the Holidays
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 36: Gym Time and Surviving the Holidays
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree hear from a pair of sisters-in-law who have a question about how to get excited about life changes after grad school, give tips on turning a gym shower into a self-care experience, and respond to a listener lo...
description:
On this week’s mini-episode Kate and Doree hear from a pair of sisters-in-law who have a question about how to get excited about life changes after grad school, give tips on turning a gym shower into a self-care experience, and respond to a listener looking for advice on getting through the holiday season.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the show at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

Today’s episode is brought to you by:

  • Brass - Go to BrassClothing.com and use code forever35 at checkout for 15% off your order.
  • Fabletics - Visit Fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for only $24
  • Banish - Use code forever35 for $10 off your first purchase.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
